object serves as a Cocoa wrapper for an Open Directory query.

abstract.text: Authenticate users, and search for contact information in Open Directory and LDAP directories.
An Open Directory context type.
An
object serves as a Cocoa wrapper for an Open Directory node.
An Open Directory node type.
An
object serves as a Cocoa wrapper for an Open Directory query.
The queryâ€™s delegate.
Creates a query object with provided parameters.
The queue on which asynchronous results are delivered to the delegate.
Returns an autoreleased query object created with provided parameters.
Removes the query from a specified run loop.
Returns results from a query synchronously.
Retrieves results from a query asynchronously by scheduling the query in a run loop.
Restarts a query, disposing of any results it has obtained.
An Open Directory query type.
An
object serves as a Cocoa wrapper for an Open Directory record.
An Open Directory record type.
An
object serves as a Cocoa wrapper for an Open Directory session.
An Open Directory session type.
The root class of most Objective-C class hierarchies, from which subclasses inherit a basic interface to the runtime system and the ability to behave as Objective-C objects.
A protocol that objects adopt to provide functional copies of themselves.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
